[文档]    def get_is_stop(self, obj):
        platform_id = Platform.objects.filter(name=SCF_MANAGEMENT_SERVICE).first().id
        # 当前编辑的用户是否有创建者角色
        is_founder = UserRole.objects.filter(
            s1_user_id=obj.id,
            role__name=FOUNDER_NAME,
            role__platform_id=platform_id
        ).exists()
        return not is_founder



[文档]    def get_user_roles(self, val):
        """
        处理返回的角色值
        :param val:
        :return:
        """

        return UserRole.objects.filter(
            s1_user_id=val.id,
            role__platform=Platform.objects.filter(name=SCF_MANAGEMENT_SERVICE
        ).first().id).values_list("role__name", flat=True)



[文档]    def validate_password(self, value):
        is_digit = False
        is_lower = False
        is_upper = False
        for char in value:
            if char.isdigit():
                is_digit = True
            if char.islower() and char.isalpha():
                is_lower = True
            if char.isupper() and char.isalpha():
                is_upper = True
        if is_digit and is_lower and is_upper:
            re_pwd = self.context.get("re_password")
            if not value == re_pwd:
                raise APIException("两次密码输入不一致")
            return value
        raise APIException("密码需要同时包含大写，小写字母和数字")



[文档]    def create(self, validated_data):
        """
        创建用户
        @param validated_data:
        @return:
        """
        role_ids = validated_data.pop("role_ids")
        # 检查手机号是否已经注册在数据库
        if S1User.objects.using("credible_data").filter(phone=validated_data["phone"]).exists():
            raise APIException("该手机号已经被注册")
        with transaction.atomic():
            # 创建用户
            user = S1User.objects.using("credible_data").create(
                username=validated_data["username"],
                phone=validated_data["phone"],
                password=make_password(validated_data["password"]),
                nick_name=validated_data["nick_name"],
                source=SCF_MANAGEMENT_SERVICE,
                root_s1_user_id=self.context.get("root_user_id"),
                parent_s1_user_id=self.context.get("parent_user_id"),
            )

            user.parent_s1_user_id = user.id
            user.last_login = datetime.datetime.now()
            user.save()
            # 关联角色
            for role_id in role_ids:
                UserRole.objects.create(
                    s1_user_id=user.id,
                    role_id=role_id
                )
            # 向s1通用模块发送请求, 添加授权信息
            grant_url = s1_grant_auth["grant_auth_url"]
            response = requests.post(
                url=grant_url,
                data={
                    "company_id": scf_config["company"],
                    "code_prefix": scf_config["scf_prefix"],
                    "user_id": user.id
                }
            )
            # logger.info(str(response.json()))
            if (response.status_code != status.HTTP_200_OK) or (response.json()["code"] != status.HTTP_200_OK):
                raise APIException("主系统授权出现异常")

            return user

[文档]    def update(self, instance: S1User, validated_data):
        """
        重写修改逻辑
        @param instance:
        @param validated_data:
        @return:
        """
        with transaction.atomic():
            instance.nick_name = validated_data.get("nick_name", instance.nick_name)
            instance.is_active = validated_data.get("is_active", instance.is_active)
            instance.phone = validated_data.get("phone", instance.phone)
            instance.save()
            UserRole.objects.filter(s1_user_id=instance.id).delete()
            for role_id in validated_data.get("role_ids"):
                UserRole.objects.create(s1_user_id=instance.id, role_id=role_id)
            return instance

[文档]    def authenticate(self, validated_data):
        """
        获取用户
        @param validated_data:
        @return:
        """

        try:
            user = S1User.objects.using("credible_data").get(phone=validated_data["phone"])
        except S1User.DoesNotExist:
            raise APIException("请输入正确的账户名")
        if not user:
            raise APIException("请输入正确的账户名")
        if not UserRole.objects.filter(s1_user_id=user.id).exists():
            is_root_user = Company.objects.using("credible_data").filter(
                pk=scf_config["company"],
                s1_user_id=user.root_s1_user_id
            ).exists()
            if not is_root_user:
                raise APIException("无服务权限")

        if not user.check_password(validated_data["pwd"]):
            raise APIException("请输入正确的登录密码")
        return user

[文档]class ForgetPwdSerializer(serializers.Serializer):
    """
    忘记密码
    """
    phone = serializers.CharField(
        max_length=11,
        min_length=11,
        trim_whitespace=True,
        validators=[phone_validator]
    )
    pwd = serializers.CharField(
        min_length=6,
        max_length=20,
        trim_whitespace=True,
        validators=[validate_pwd]
    )
    sms_code = serializers.CharField(
        min_length=4,
        max_length=4
    )


[文档]    @staticmethod
    def forget_pwd(validated_data):
        """
        重置用户密码
        @param validated_data:
        @return:
        """
        phone = validated_data.get("phone")

        # 判断能否找到用户
        try:
            user = S1User.objects.using('credible_data').get(phone=phone)
        except S1User.DoesNotExist:
            raise APIException("无此用户")

        # 验证码校验
        result = validate_reset_code(phone, validated_data.get("sms_code"))
        if result['status'] != "success":
            raise APIException(result['tips'])

        # 修改密码
        user.set_password(validated_data.get("pwd"))
        user.save()
        return True

[文档]    @staticmethod
    def forget_pwd(phone, validated_data, s1_user_id):
        """
        重置用户密码
        """
        # 判断能否找到用户
        try:
            user = S1User.objects.using('credible_data').get(phone=phone)
        except S1User.DoesNotExist:
            raise APIException("无此用户")

        # 验证码校验
        result = validate_reset_code(phone, validated_data.get("sms_code"))
        if result['status'] != "success":
            raise APIException(result['tips'])

        user = S1User.objects.using('credible_data').get(phone=phone)
        user.set_password(validated_data.get("pwd"))
        user.save()
        return True
